body_html:
Hi @mrry
Thanks for your answer. I mentioned the way that I tried to set a smaller number of threads, but it doesn't help.
Do you have any suggestion for me to do this?
As @pudae mentioned here
"It seems that there is no way to reduce number of threads with using slim.
I tested evaluation scripts with num_preprocessing_threads=1,
then I found that slim create 6 threads for input pipeline and 1 thread for event logger."
body_text:
Hi @mrry
Thanks for your answer. I mentioned the way that I tried to set a smaller number of threads, but it doesn't help.
Do you have any suggestion for me to do this?
As @pudae mentioned here
"It seems that there is no way to reduce number of threads with using slim.

then I found that slim create 6 threads for input pipeline and 1 thread for event logger."
body:
Hi @mrry 
Thanks for your answer. I mentioned the way that I tried to set a smaller number of threads, but it doesn't help.
Do you have any suggestion for me to do this?
As @pudae mentioned [here](https://github.com/pudae/tensorflow-densenet/issues/7#issuecomment-351054685) 
"It seems that there is no way to reduce number of threads with using slim.
I tested evaluation scripts with num_preprocessing_threads=1,
then I found that slim create 6 threads for input pipeline and 1 thread for event logger."

> 

>
